Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>.
It seems that you have completed all
the work on Town Restoration 4.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh ho ho!
Everybody knew you could do it!
<PAGE>
Hana and the others came to say thank
you!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks to you, we now have a delicious
restaurant in town, and a clinic too!
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And it's also thanks to you that Hossan
and Niko came back to town, <MYNAME>.
They said so!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was your energy that revitalized
this town.
<PAGE>
On behalf of everyone, I want to say
how grateful we are.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We now have all the facilities a proper
town needs. It's a great place to live
again, as it used to be.
<PAGE>
And now we want to make it better than
ever. Because if it's only like it was
before, people might leave again.
<PAGE>
So everyone talked it over and decided
to make the town better than ever.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
After discussing it, we came up with a
town restoration plan that will make the
town better than it's ever been before.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we can carry out this plan, the town
will be better than ever, no doubt
about it. Will you do it for us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>!
So I'll give you this.
<PAGE>
It's the new town restoration plan that
everyone worked on.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And one more thing, we finished clearing
the land to the left of your farm.
Go check it out some time.
<PAGE>
I believe that the progress of your farm
is essential to the development of our
town! So please make full use of it!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know we can count on you, <MYNAME>.
And thank you, truly.
It's in your capable hands.

A new town restoration plan... how
exciting to see what's in it! Check the
details of the plan from the <RED>menu</RED>.
